Good job drunken! Love it.

[scar]absolute
abstract
as
assembler
class
constructor
contains
default
destructor
downto
dynamic
except
export
far
file
finally
forward
goto
implementation
in
initialization
interface
is
library
message
nil
object
on
out
override
package
packed
pascal
private
property
protected
public
record
requires
set
shl
shr
try
unit
uses
with
xor[/scar] There is ‘‘few’’ that should be bold…

item.title: [scar] tags :)
item.dc:creator: @Drunkenoldma Drunkenoldma
item.description:
@Drunkenoldma wrote:

People, thanks for the great replies, drunkonjava, add me on msn: drunkenoldma@rs-server.net (I won’t give the source though, but i’ll learn u how to make it (if i find time :p))

Anyway, If anyone has a list for allllllllll words that are bold, can u please pm/email/msn me ? Thx

///

EDIT: I’ve send some words that need to parse bold to mopar, these:
[scar]array, type, function, const, case[/scar] if they show bold, then mopar must have updated

Now all the words are:
[scar]program, var, string, Procedure, begin, end;, end., if, and, then, repeat, until, or, end, not, while, do, else, Mod, of, for, to, div, array, type, function, const, case[/scar]

EDIT2: I’ll make a java parser too if u want -.-

Read full topic
